Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute near Island/Marquette
ShortDescription: #67 67th/69th/71st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Stony Island/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th/69th/71st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Stony Island/Marquette.

Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, Cottage Grove, 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffery and 67th

Westbound buses will operate via 67th, Stony Island, 63rd, Cottage Grove and 67th.

Headline: Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffrey Local & #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/Marquette
ShortDescription: SB #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffrey Local & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted, near Stony Island/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffrey Local & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive and Jeffery, due street blockage near Stony Island/Marquette

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
